content: this is just a quick little pattern for 2 cable stitch dishcloths i just love this stitch knock knees the cable stitch or 3-double_crochet cross-over is used in each row the result is a fabric with diagonal spikes that slant in a different direction in each row paternoster the cable stitch or 3-double_crochet cross-over is used in every second row every other row is a standard single_crochet row the result is a fabric in which all the spikes slant the same way i have also done a photo tutorial for the cable stitch 1 should you need some visual assistance size depends on the hook you choose to use happy hooking dedri 1 http //www lookatwhatimade net/crafts/yarn/crochet/how-to-crochet-cable-stitch/
